borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
description: Fell to ground level of a Lime tree (T1) and an Ash tree (T2) located in the rear car park area, both subject to Tree Preservation Order TPO/27/11/70; Works to trees subject to Tree Preservation Order TPO/27/11/70 comprising of: pruning a London Plane Tree (T3) in the rear car park area, by removal of epicormic growth; pruning of a Lime tree (T4) by the entrance to car park on Crabtree Lane, by reduction all round to previous reduction points approx. 2-3m and removal of dead wood; pruning of an Ash tree (T5) on the Crabtree Lane frontage, by reduction back from property to give 2m clearance and lift over pavement to statutory height; pruning of a False Acacia tree (T6) on the Crabtree Lane frontage, by reduction all round to previous reduction points approx. 2m; pruning of a Lime tree (T7) on the Crabtree Lane frontage, by repairing cavity at approx 1m and creating new pollarded form at approx. 4m above ground level (3-4m reduction); pruning of a Lime tree (T8) on the Crabtree Lane frontage, by reduction to give 2m clearance from property and lift over pavement to statutory height; pruning of a London Plane tree (T9) on the Crabtree Lane frontage, by repollarding by approx. 6-7m; pruning of a London Plane tree (T10) on the Crabtree Lane frontage, by repollarding by approx. 6-7m; pruning of a Lime tree (T11) on the Crabtree Lane frontage, by reduction all round to previous reduction points approx. 2-3m; pruning of a London Plane tree (T12) on the Crabtree Lane frontage, by reduction all round to previous reduction points approx 2-3m; pruning of a Lime tree (T13) on the Fulham Palace Road frontage, by reduction all round to previous reduction points approx 2m; pruning of a London Plane tree (T14) on the Fulham Palace Road frontage, by lifting over road, pavement and bus shelter to statutory height; and pruning of a Lime tree (T15) on the Fulham Palace Road frontage, by reduction all round to previous reduction points approx 2m.
